name: A Little Cooking
description:
Made for the $100 JTAGame Jam #4 over the course of 5 days. We had to use this tutorial in our project with the theme "Take One Leave the Rest."

Sorry about the wall of text instructions page lol.

Hope you like it!

CREDITS:

Food sprites: 

Free Pixel foods by ghostpixxells

Fruit+ by SciGho

Food and a little bit of kitchenware by VectorPixelStar

Tileset and Characters:

16xx16 Tileset (Pokemon/Zelda style:D) by Damian Gasinski aka Gassasin

Huge thanks to all of these people that made the game look so good!
